rules_text:
Suvic arrives in Werchrin in utter shock; the change of scenery combined with the implications of his entire existence paralyzes him. Eventually, hunger drives him to explore. Feeling compelled to approach a panicking bystander, Suvic notices both her mania and his own need dissolve. As he continues to feed on others, he realizes his own nature as a psychic vampire feeding on negative emotion; uncertain of what to do, but still hungry, he continues to wander and investigate.
News of the soothing stranger reach the ears of Thomar, the man behind Werchrin's supernatural panic; fearing the loss of his divine patron, he attacks Suvic. Thomar's strength is, at first, too much for Suvic to overcome; however, his ‘victims' arrive and aid their savior, and with Suvic is able to overcome the warlock.
Thomar's master abandons him as no longer useful and retreats away from the world. After fighting for his life and seeing the positive effects he's had, Suvic finds himself filled with hope and motivation for the future; for now, he chooses to stay in Werchrin, honing his abilities and figuring out his next step.
